title: An Invitation to Join in the Song of Praise
html:
2 Nephi 22:6. "Cry out and shout" Normally we don't condone shouting in Church, but our joy will be such in the millennial day that perhaps shouting praises will be appropriate, as it is on those rare occasions when we participate in the thrilling "hosanna shout."

How Does This Tree Help Me Today?

In our best moments, when we are humble enough to consider our sinful state and we imagine where we might be were it not for our Savior, we will experience similar feelings to those described in the chapter. We will recognize the joy of having a Savior, and we will want to praise his name and declare it among the people. We can experience this kind of joy not just in the Millennium but whenever we consider what great things the Lord has done for us, what great things he has done for our fathers, and what great things he will do in the millennial day.
